name: Salvador's New Job
description:
You are new Salvador Dali - Salv'a Don Daly.  You want to build your atelier. To do that you will have to collect 1 000 000$. Create games by recruiting teams. The longer you create game, the more money you can get. If you predict trends of genre correctly you can get multiple earnings. Be careful because if you're too much in debt (-10 000$) you're going to lose your game (and life).

To play this game we HAVE TO attach to the main folder this extracted asset file. It's file with names of random people!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1BmCjuYIy5CiK9VY7P0KvWig3NBGlz6U8?usp=sha...

If you don't want to dwonload two things you can also download the same game from here:

https://perushark.itch.io/salvadors-new-job

Music is not mine.

Comments are welcome, sorry for one resolution but at this gamejam I hadn't more time to make it all work. I hope you will like it in some way :)
